input.rewritten_query: 分析22级计算机科学与技术专业一班的成绩趋势

sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT score.term, score.score_value FROM score JOIN student ON score.student_id = student.id JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND class.class_name LIKE '%一班%' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0 AND score.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.term, AVG(base.score_value) AS avg_score_value FROM base GROUP BY base.term ORDER BY base.term

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“年级/入学年份（如 2022 级）”及 probe_samples 中 class.grade_year 候选值 ["2022", "2024", "2023", "2025"]，'22级' 映射为数值 2022
probe_samples 中 major.major_name 候选值包含精确匹配项 '计算机科学与技术'，直接采用 '=' 过滤
probe_samples 中 class.class_name 候选值如 '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' 包含 '一班'，但无完全一致项；结合语义和常见命名习惯（'1班'常口语化称'一班'），采用 LIKE '%一班%' 模糊匹配以确保覆盖，且已通过 grade_year 和 major_name 强约束缩小范围

sql_validate_result.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT score.term, score.score_value FROM score JOIN student ON score.student_id = student.id JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND class.class_name LIKE '%一班%' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0 AND score.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.term, AVG(base.score_value) AS avg_score_value FROM base GROUP BY base.term ORDER BY base.term

SELECT DISTINCT major.major_name AS value FROM major WHERE major.major_name IS NOT NULL AND major.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
